message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it, as I know that's what it's worth to you.  Let me know if that works.
I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $125?
Alice,  $125 is still a bit high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $110. It's a fair price, and I'm sure you'll be able to make a profit on it.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $115?

Alice, I truly appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $115 is closer, I'm still a bit out of my comfort zone. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $110.  Let's see if we can seal the deal!
